page.title: 17THE ATTRACTIONS OF EARSDON
page.content: (E)arsdon is built on a hill of sandstone.It is one of the highest points in North Tyneside.There is a park,shop,church,chapel Cannon Red Lion (pubs),Community Centre and a hall. (A)ll the people in Earsdon are friendly,in church,pubs and the one general dealer shop which does shoe re- pairs t. (R)upert is the friendly ghost of Earsdon.He haunts the Cannon Inn. (S)uper Gran was filmed in Earsdon,but the name was changed to Chistleton. (D)isaster is remembered at the Hartley Pit Memorial in the old churchyard.204 miners died in 1862. (O)n the hill is the church with a tower-St.Albans.Over to the east is the North Sea,and to the north are the Cheviot Hills. (N)ear the Red Lion is a War Memorial. Earsdon is well worth a visit.
